name: Tiazelli's Revenge
description:
You are Tiazelli, Earth's greatest space warrior. Sadly, aliens have attacked your planet. It is your duty to get to the mothership and destroy as much Enemies as possible
Press W (or Z) and S to move and use the mouse to aim and shoot

Coding, Sprites and Sound Design by Me, Music by TeknoAXE (https://www.youtube.com/user/teknoaxe)
